title.narrative: GOPA-SERVICE CONT.-TECH.ASSIST.UNIT FOR CIVIL SOCIETY FUNDEUR998186 FOR 36 MONTHS

description.narrative: GOPA-SERVICE CONT.-TECH.ASSIST.UNIT FOR CIVIL SOCIETY FUNDEUR998186 FOR 36 MONTHS -

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Ethiopia

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Ethiopia

description.narrative: LOCATION: ADDIS ABABA, ETHIOPIA BENEFICIARY: FEDERAL DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF ETHIOPIA PURPOSE:THE PURPOSE OF THE PROGRAMME IS TO INCREASE AND IMPROVE NSA DIALOGU WITH THEIR CONSTITUENCIES, WITH THE ETHIOPIAN GOVERNMENT, OTHER STAKEHOLDER AND AMONGST THEMSELVES, AND ALSO TO INCREASE NSA'S CAPACITY TO ACTIVELY PARTICIPATE IN THE NATIONAL DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.
